statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 11 \\ -10 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 13 \\ -22 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
